titles.title: Recognizing the importance of The Call of the Wild on the occasion of the 101st anniversary of the publication of the novel by Jack London.
Recognizing the importance of The Call of the Wild on the occasion of the 101st anniversary of the publication of the novel by Jack London.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service and Agency Organization.

bill.summary: Recognizes: (1) Jack London as a uniquely American author; (2) the 101st anniversary of the publication of Jack London's The Call of the Wild; and (3) The Call of the Wild as a truly great American novel.
